DOC.brief_title: A Controlled-Feeding Study Assess Effect Cashews Fasting Lipoprotein Levels
DOC.detailed_description: This trial utilize randomize , two-period crossover design examine effect cashew consumption LDL-C aspect fast lipoprotein lipid profile healthy , moderately hyper-cholesterolemic individual consume typical `` American diet . '' Two arm consist two 28-day controlled-feeding treatment period allow isocaloric comparison diet without cashew .
DOC.criteria: BMI ≥18.00 ≤32.00 kg/m^2 Fasting LDLC level ≥130 mg/dL < 200 mg/dL Fasting TG ≤350 mg/dL CHD CHD risk equivalent Pregnancy Use lipid alter medication stop Certain liver , kidney , lung , gastrointestinal condition Poorly control hypertension Certain medication Allergy sensitivity nut food/beverage food/beverage component Active cancer treat within prior 2 year ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) Significant weight loss gain within prior 3 month
